+/null/locmsg;CardText;;Subtract 1 VP during the War Status Phase of each Winter turn. (VASSAL Note: VP markers will be placed at the beginning of each Winter turn, or right away if event is played during a Winter turn. Although the VP "formally" arrives in War Status phase at the end of the turn, the only time VP is actually checked for autovictory is at the end of the turn during War Status -- so in other words the VP total will always be right at the time it is needed. Since the Vassal module doesn't offer a convenient "stop and have a War Status phase right here", this is the implementation that seems to generate the least confusion and provide the most accuracy.) prototype;CardAP_MO\ macro;AR Marker;;;;57390\,0\,PlayAsEvent;57363\,0\,ARMarkerToEV;false;;;counted;;;;false;;1;1\\ globalkey;;57390,0,PlayAsEvent;49,130;{BasicName=="Blockade"};false;1;false;true;;;-1;COUNTER|false|MAP|||||0|0||false|||EQUALS\\\ mark;CardNum\\\\ prototype;AP_RP_L3\\\\\ mark;WS\\\\\\ mark;Ops,SR\\\\\\\ globalkey;;57390,0,PlayAsEvent;57955,0,Blockade;BasicName = VP;false;1;true;true;;;-1;COUNTER|false|MAP|||||0|0||false|||EQUALS\\\\\\\\ prototype;CardAP_Remove\\\\\\\\\ piece;;;card_ap02.svg;Blockade/ \ \\ \\\ 2\\\\ \\\\\ 2\\\\\\ 4,4\\\\\\\ \\\\\\\\ \\\\\\\\\ null;0;0;1;0

VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.filter: BasicName = Turn || Action = Y || MO = Y || RP = Y || NESR = Y
VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.name: End Turn

VASSAL.build.module.ToolbarMenu.menuItems: Calculate Current VP (ALT V),Final Scoring (ALT CTRL V)
VASSAL.build.module.ToolbarMenu.tooltip: VP's and Scoring - will recalculate VP's based on current VP sites controlled, Event Markers currently on map/turn track, etc. Optionally calculates Final Scoring (which can in addition safely be used to calculate *potential* final scoring as if game ended based on current conditions)

VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.name: Calculate Current VP (ALT V)
VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.tooltip: Recalculates current VP based on VP sites controlled, event markers on map or turn track, etc.

VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.name: Final Scoring (ALT CTRL V)
VASSAL.build.module.GlobalKeyCommand.tooltip: Calculates Final Scoring - can also be used during the game to see what final scoring "would be" based on current game state.
